verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> be <S%H7891>sung<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> We have a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city;<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> will God <S%H7896>appoint<s%> for <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H2426>bulwarks.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> you the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> which <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H529>truth<s%> may <S%H935>enter<s%> in.
You will <S%H5341>keep<s%> him in perfect <S%H7965>peace,<s%> whose <S%H3336>mind<s%> is <S%H5564>stayed<s%> on you: <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H982>trusts<s%> in you.
<S%H982>Trust<s%> you in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5703>ever:<s%> for in the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6697>strength:<s%>

For he <S%H7817>brings<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H4791>on<s%> <S%H4791>high;<s%> the <S%H7682>lofty<s%> <S%H7151>city,<s%> he lays it <S%H8213>low;<s%> he lays it <S%H8213>low,<s%> even to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> he <S%H5060>brings<s%> it even to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
The <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H7429>tread<s%> it down, even the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and the <S%H6471>steps<s%> of the <S%H1800>needy.<s%>
The <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is <S%H4339>uprightness:<s%> you, most <S%H3477>upright,<s%> do <S%H6424>weigh<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>just.<s%>

<S%H637>Yes,<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> have we <S%H6960>waited<s%> for you; the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is to your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and to the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of you.

With my <S%H5315>soul<s%> have I <S%H183>desired<s%> you in the <S%H3915>night;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> with my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me will I <S%H7836>seek<s%> you <S%H7836>early:<s%> for <S%H834>when<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> will <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

Let <S%H2603>favor<s%> be showed to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> yet will he not <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5229>uprightness<s%> will he deal <S%H5765>unjustly,<s%> and will not <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H1348>majesty<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when your <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up, they will not <S%H2372>see:<s%> but they shall <S%H2372>see,<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for their <S%H7068>envy<s%> at the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of your <S%H6862>enemies<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.
<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you will <S%H8239>ordain<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for us: for you <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H6466>worked<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H4639>works<s%> in us.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> other <S%H113>lords<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> you have had <S%H1166>dominion<s%> over us: but by you <S%H905>only<s%> will we make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

They are <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they shall not <S%H2421>live;<s%> they are <S%H7496>deceased,<s%> they shall not <S%H6965>rise:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> have you <S%H6485>visited<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, and made <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2143>memory<s%> to <S%H6>perish.<s%>

You have <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation:<s%> you are <S%H3513>glorified:<s%> you had <S%H7368>removed<s%> it <S%H7368>far<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in <S%H6862>trouble<s%> have they <S%H6485>visited<s%> you, they <S%H6694>poured<s%> out a <S%H3908>prayer<s%> when your <S%H4148>chastening<s%> was on them.

<S%H3644>Like<s%> as a woman with <S%H2030>child,<s%> that draws <S%H7126>near<s%> the time of her <S%H3205>delivery,<s%> is in <S%H2342>pain,<s%> and <S%H2199>cries<s%> out in her <S%H2256>pangs;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have we <S%H1961>been<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

We have been with <S%H2029>child,<s%> we have been in <S%H2342>pain,<s%> we have as it were <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%> we have not <S%H6213>worked<s%> any <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H1077>neither<s%> have the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>

Your <S%H4191>dead<s%> men shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> together with my <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>body<s%> shall they <S%H6965>arise.<s%> <S%H6974>Awake<s%> and <S%H7442>sing,<s%> you that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H6083>dust:<s%> for your <S%H2919>dew<s%> is as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5307>cast<s%> out the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>

<S%H3212>Come,<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> you into your <S%H2315>chambers,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> your <S%H1817>doors<s%> <S%H1157>about<s%> you: <S%H2247>hide<s%> yourself as it were for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H5674>over.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> also shall <S%H1540>disclose<s%> her <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H2026>slain.<s%>
